name: @sealsystems/countingstream
description: @sealsystems/countingstream counts the stream length in bytes.

scripts.release: npm run bot release && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm run bot release --type minor && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm run bot release --type major && npm publish
scripts.report: npm run coverage && if [[ $OSTYPE == darwin* ]]; then open=open; else open=xdg-open; fi && $open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
